text: The 2016 Conference USA men's soccer season was the 22nd season of men's varsity soccer in the conference. The FIU Panthers are both the defending conference tournament champions. The Kentucky Wildcats are the defending regular season champions. == Changes from 2015 == * None == Teams == === Stadiums and locations === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" ! Team ! Location ! Stadium !
